item.description:
A translation follows.

Aggiungiamoci a 3 meetups cioe Social Fun, Boston Happy Hour & Fun with Alcohol per incontrarci e divertirci con gli <<appetizer specials>> che offre Phoenix Landing -- uno sconto di %50 --pero attenzione bisogna arrivare prima dell' ora dicianove perche dopo, lo sconto non c'e piu.

Translation,
Lets join with 3 other major meetups this time, Boston Happy Hour,  Social Fun, & Fun with Alcohol to take advantage of the Appetizer Special which is 50% off, but be careful to get there before 7 PM when the special ends!

Of course, we will huddle together to practice our Italian!!

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Lunedì Italiano

item.name: Phoenix Landing w/ Social Fun
